metadata.title: CVE-2024-1459 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A path traversal vulnerability was found in Undertow. This issue may allowa remote attacker to append a specially-crafted sequence to an HTTP requestfor an application deployed to JBoss EAP, which may permit access toprivileged or restricted files and directories.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
